page.title: 01Introduction to the Square.
page.content: The area described in the following pages is located at the South West corner of South West London on the borders of Surrey. It incorporates parts of the London Boroughs of Merton and Sutton.All the area used to be part of Surrey and many areas still have 'Surrey'as part of the postal address.Merton and Sutton came into being in 1965. It is predominantly a suburban residential area providing homes for those people who live and work in the area and also for those who commute to Central London,Croydon or Kingston.It is a pleasant area in which to live with a variety of parks and open space providing plenty of opportunities for sports and walking. there is some light industry on small unobtrusive industrial estates which provde jobs for local peoplee.
